title: Twitter loves Michelle Obama's natural curls at Obama Foundation Summit
text:
This year, we have seen Michelle Obama wear her natural curls more often than in past years, and many people are loving it.

Interested in Michelle Obama? Add Michelle Obama as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Michelle Obama news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

On Tuesday, she showed off her gorgeous ringlets at the Obama Foundation Summit in Chicago and people immediately took to commenting on how great her hair looked.

Scott Olson/Getty Images

"Michelle Obama's natural hair gives me life," @yagrlhannahrose wrote on Twitter.

Another joked, "Michelle Obama with natural hair. That's it. That's the tweet."

Countless others also celebrated her curly coiffure with similar sentiments on social media.

The former FLOTUS paired a gold necklaces with a fitted green jumpsuit.

Rewinding back to July, Obama was also spotted in New York City with honey blonde highlighted natural curls and a white dress.

GC Images/Getty Images, FILE

Earlier that same month, her curls were a big hit at the 2019 Essence Music Festival.

FilmMagic via Getty Images, FILE

With the amount of love that continues to pour in, there's a big chance there will be more mesmerizing mane moments from Mrs. Obama soon.
description: Many people are loving Michelle Obama's natural curls worn at the Obama Foundation Summit.
